commands.info:
Hello! Welcome to the official bot of PSITOGEG_SRL!

🌟 What can you do here?

🔹 /reg – Register quickly and easily to access all our features.
🔹 /log – Log in to access your account and manage our services.

If you need help or additional information, don't hesitate to contact us!

🚨 This bot was created for the company PSITOGEG_SRL and only employees are allowed to use it. 📢 This bot sends notifications and the user should register or log in before that.
commands.reg: 📝 Registration Information To register, you need the following information: 1. 👤 Username: Choose a unique username. 2. 🔒 User Password: Create a password for your account. 3. 🛠️ Admin Password: Enter the admin password, which is unique for each user. Make sure to enter all the correct information to complete the registration. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us! 📩
commands.log: 🔑 Login Information To log in, you need the following information: 1. 👤 Username: Enter your username. 2. 🔒 Password: Enter your account password. Make sure to enter the correct information to access your account. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us! 📩
